name: SPEC / PROCESS Workflow Template
description: Elaborates structural plans into concrete specifications and interfaces.
inputs: job.stage MUST equal SPEC and job.subflow MUST equal PROCESS.
Guards MUST stay TRUE; lock MUST be active; job.status MUST be working; job.halted MUST be FALSE.
SPEC ingress notes MUST be available plus any upstream governance constraints or operator clarifications.
structure_plan_ok MUST stay TRUE or PROCESS MUST HALT.
steps: Break down ingress assumptions into modules/components and record them in spec_path.
Document PlusCal-style pseudocode expectations for each logical block as inline comments when required (no other pseudocode formats permitted).
Capture interface contracts, data requirements, and verification checkpoints inside registry_path.
Review draft with operator for completeness, capturing approvals or change requests inline.
outputs: spec_path containing structured sections (overview, logic, data, risks).
registry_path capturing interface entries tied to module identifiers.
acceptance: Every ingress assumption MUST map to at least one specification section.
Interfaces MUST identify consumers/producers and validation hooks.
Operator MUST sign off on the elaboration or explicitly defer items with owners/dates.
